Grand Finale.NAME: Veliko finale
Grand Finale.DESCRIPTION: Možeš odigrati samo ako na gom. za odbac. nema karata. Zadaj !D! štete SVIM neprijateljima.
Grand Finale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gomila za odbacivanje NL mora biti #rprazna.

Immolate.NAME: Sažeži
Immolate.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete SVIM neprijateljima. Dodaj opekotinu na gom. za odbac.

Regret.NAME: Kajanje
Regret.DESCRIPTION: Neodigriva. NL Na kraju poteza izgubi jedan ž. p. za svaku kartu koja ti ostane u ruci.

Crippling Poison.NAME: Sakateća isparenja
Crippling Poison.DESCRIPTION: Nanesi !M! otrova i dve slabosti SVIM neprijateljima. NL Iscrpi.

A Thousand Cuts.NAME: Hiljadu rezova
A Thousand Cuts.DESCRIPTION: Svaki put kad odigraš kartu, zadaj SVIM neprijateljima štetu: !M!.

Spot Weakness.NAME: Otkri slabost
Spot Weakness.DESCRIPTION: Ako neprijatelj namerava da napadne, povećaj svoju snagu za !M!.

Dark Shackles.NAME: Mračni okovi
Dark Shackles.DESCRIPTION: Smanji snagu neprijatelja za !M! do kraja trenutnog kruga. NL Iscrpi.

Glass Knife.NAME: Stakleni nož
Glass Knife.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete dvaput. Ubojitost ove karte se smanjuje za dva tokom ove borbe.

Cloak And Dagger.NAME: Plašt i bodež
Cloak And Dagger.DESCRIPTION: Zadobi !B! odbrane. NL Dodaj !M! nož u ruku.
Cloak And Dagger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Zadobi !B! odbrane. NL Dodaj !M! noža u ruku.

Underhanded Strike.NAME: Prepredeni udarac
Underhanded Strike.DESCRIPTION: Nanesi !D! štete. Ako si odbacio kartu u trenutnom potezu, NL zadobi [G] [G].

Anger.NAME: Gnev
Anger.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete. NL Stavi kopiju ove karte na gomilu za odbacivanje.

Storm of Steel.NAME: Oluja čelika
Storm of Steel.DESCRIPTION: Odbaci ruku. NL Za svaku odbačenu kartu, dodaj jedan nož u ruku.
Storm of Steel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Odbaci ruku. NL Za svaku odbačenu kartu, dodaj jedan poboljšan nož u ruku.

Wraith Form v2.NAME: Utvara
Wraith Form v2.DESCRIPTION: Zadobi !M! neopipljivosti. NL Na kraju svog poteza, izgubi jednu okretnost.

Sadistic Nature.NAME: Rođeni sadista
Sadistic Nature.DESCRIPTION: Svaki put kada neprijatelju naneseš negativan status, zadaj mu !M! štete.

J.A.X..NAME: Dž.E.K.S.
J.A.X..DESCRIPTION: Izgubi tri ž. p. NL Povećaj svoju NL snagu za !M!. NL Iscrpi.

Offering.NAME: Prinos
Offering.DESCRIPTION: Izgubi četiri ž. p. NL Zadobi [R] [R]. NL Vuci karte: !M!. NL Iscrpi.

Exhume.NAME: Povrati
Exhume.DESCRIPTION: Prebaci kartu NL iz gomile za iscrpljene NL u ruku. NL Iscrpi.

Power Through.NAME: Istraj
Power Through.DESCRIPTION: Dodaj dve rane u ruku. NL Zadobi !B! odbrane.

Dual Wield.NAME: Dvostruko rukovanje
Dual Wield.DESCRIPTION: Načini kopiju napada ili moći iz ruke.

Flex.NAME: Napregnuće
Flex.DESCRIPTION: Povećaj svoju snagu za !M!. NL Smanji je za !M! na kraju poteza.

Bullet Time.NAME: Zamrzni vreme
Bullet Time.DESCRIPTION: Sve karte u ruci su besplatne tokom trenutnog poteza, ali ne možeš da vučeš karte.

Catalyst.NAME: Katalizator
Catalyst.DESCRIPTION: Udvostruči otrov na neprijatelju. NL Iscrpi.

Reaper.NAME: Žetelac
Reaper.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj SVIM neprijateljima !D! štete i zaleči se za neodbranjeno. Iscrpi.

Tactician.NAME: Taktika
Tactician.DESCRIPTION: Neodigriva. NL Ako je ova karta odbačena iz ruke, zadobi [G].

Bane.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete. NL Ako je neprijatelj otrovan, zadaj mu još !D! štete.

Infernal Blade.NAME: Vraško sečivo
Infernal Blade.DESCRIPTION: Dodaj nasumičan napad u ruku. NL Besplatan je ovaj potez. NL Iscrpi.

After Image.NAME: Obrisi
After Image.DESCRIPTION: Svaki put kada odigraš kartu, zadobi jednu odbranu.

Unload.NAME: Iskasapi
Unload.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete. NL Odbaci SVE karte koje nisu napadi.

Dagger Throw.NAME: Baci bodež
Dagger Throw.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete. NL Vuci jednu kartu. NL Odbaci jednu kartu.

Brutality.NAME: Brutalnost
Brutality.DESCRIPTION: Na početku poteza, izgubi jedan ž. p. i vuci jednu kartu.
Brutality.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Urođena. NL Na početku poteza, izgubi jedan ž. p. i vuci jednu kartu.

Reckless Charge.DESCRIPTION: Nanesi !D! štete. NL Ubaci ošamućenost u gomilu za vučenje.

Decay.NAME: Raspadanje
Decay.DESCRIPTION: Neodigriva. NL Na kraju poteza, primi dve štete.

Tools of the Trade.NAME: Alatke
Tools of the Trade.DESCRIPTION: Na početku poteza, vuci jednu kartu i odbaci jednu kartu.

Dramatic Entrance.NAME: Dramatični ulaz
Dramatic Entrance.DESCRIPTION: Urođena. NL Zadaj !D! štete SVIM neprijateljima. NL Iscrpi.

Hemokinesis.NAME: Hemokineza
Hemokinesis.DESCRIPTION: Izgubi !M! ž. p. NL Zadaj !D! štete.

Intimidate.NAME: Zastraši
Intimidate.DESCRIPTION: Nanesi SVIM neprijateljima slabost: !M!. NL Iscrpi.

Necronomicurse.NAME: Nekronomikletva
Necronomicurse.DESCRIPTION: Neodigriva. NL Od ove kletve nema spasa.

Choke.NAME: Davljenje
Choke.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete. Svaki put kada odigraš kartu, ciljani neprijatelj gubi !M! ž. p.

Juggernaut.NAME: Sivonja
Juggernaut.DESCRIPTION: Svaki put kada zadobiješ odbranu, zadaj !M! štete nasumičnom neprijatelju.

Caltrops.NAME: Čičci
Caltrops.DESCRIPTION: Svaki put kad te neko napadne, zadaj mu !M! štete.

Blur.NAME: Trk
Blur.DESCRIPTION: Zadobi !B! odbrane. NL Odbrana se ne uklanja na početku sledećeg poteza.

Body Slam.NAME: Nalet
Body Slam.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj štetu jednaku tvojoj trenutnoj odbrani.

Setup.NAME: Priprema
Setup.DESCRIPTION: Stavi kartu iz ruke NL na vrh gomile za vučenje. NL Biće besplatna sve dok se ne odigra.

Blood for Blood.NAME: Krv za krv
Blood for Blood.DESCRIPTION: Svaki put kada izgubiš ž. p. od napada, trošak ove karte se smanjuje za [R]. Zadaj !D! štete.

Shrug It Off.NAME: Odbi
Shrug It Off.DESCRIPTION: Zadobi !B! odbrane. NL Vuci jednu kartu.

Clash.NAME: Obračun
Clash.DESCRIPTION: Možeš odigrati samo ako su sve karte u ruci napadi. NL Zadaj !D! štete.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: U ruci imam karte koje nisu napadi.

Thunderclap.NAME: Tresak
Thunderclap.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete i nanesi jednu ranjivost SVIM neprijateljima.

Flame Barrier.NAME: Plamena barijera
Flame Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Zadobi !B! odbrane. NL Svaki put kad te neko u trenutnom krugu napadne, zadaj mu !M! štete.

Endless Agony.NAME: Beskrajna agonija
Endless Agony.DESCRIPTION: Svaki put kad vučeš ovu kartu, dodaj jednu kopiju nje u ruku. Zadaj !D! štete. NL Iscrpi.

Berserk.NAME: Razjarenost
Berserk.DESCRIPTION: Ako su ti ž. p. na ili ispod 50%, zadobi [R] na početku poteza.

Burning Pact.NAME: Pakleni sporazum
Burning Pact.DESCRIPTION: Iscrpi jednu kartu. NL Vuci !M! karte.

Pain.NAME: Bol
Pain.DESCRIPTION: Neodigriva. NL Gubiš jedan ž. p. sa svakom odigranom kartom dok god je ova u ruci.

Burst.NAME: Navala
Burst.DESCRIPTION: Ovaj potez, sledeće umeće odigraj dvaput.

Acrobatics.NAME: Akrobacija

Envenom.DESCRIPTION: Svaki put kada napadom zadaš neodbranjenu štetu, nanesi jedan otrov.

Parasite.DESCRIPTION: Neodigriva. NL Ako je ova karta preobražena ili uklonjena iz špila, gubiš tri maks. ž. p.

Shockwave.DESCRIPTION: Nanesi !M! slabosti i ranjivosti SVIM neprijateljima. NL Iscrpi.

Rampage.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete, i još !M! za svako prethodno odigravanje ove karte u trenutnoj borbi.

Sever Soul.DESCRIPTION: Iscrpi iz ruke NL sve karte koje NL nisu napadi. NL Zadaj !D! štete.

Whirlwind.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete SVIM neprijateljima X puta.

Bite.NAME: Ujed

Escape Plan.NAME: Plan povlačenja
Escape Plan.DESCRIPTION: Vuci jednu kartu. NL Ako je karte umeće, zadobi !B! odbrane.

Die Die Die.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete SVIM neprijateljima. NL Iscrpi.

Infinite Blades.DESCRIPTION: Na početku poteza, dodaj nož u ruku.

Double Tap.NAME: Je'n-dva
Double Tap.DESCRIPTION: U trenutnom potezu, odigraj svoj sledeći napad dvaput.
Double Tap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: U trenutnom potezu, odigraj svoja sledeća !M! napada dvaput.

Thinking Ahead.NAME: Korak ispred
Thinking Ahead.DESCRIPTION: Vuci dve karte. NL Stavi kartu iz ruke na vrh gomile za vučenje. NL Iscrpi.
Thinking Ahead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Vuci dve karte. NL Stavi kartu iz ruke na vrh gomile za vučenje.

Distraction.NAME: Diverzija
Distraction.DESCRIPTION: Dodaj nasumično umeće u ruku. NL Ovaj potez je besplatno. NL Iscrpi.

Dodge and Roll.NAME: Kolut u stranu
Dodge and Roll.DESCRIPTION: Zadobi !B! odbrane. NL Sledeći potez zadobi !B! odbrane.

All Out Attack.NAME: Nebouzdan napad
All Out Attack.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete SVIM neprijateljima. NL Odbaci jednu nasumičnu kartu.

Flying Knee.NAME: Kolenom u skoku
Flying Knee.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete. NL Sledeći potez NL zadobi [G].

Predator.NAME: Predator
Predator.DESCRIPTION: Zadaj !D! štete. NL Sledeći potez vuci dve karte više.

Madness.NAME: Ludilo
Madness.DESCRIPTION: Nasumična karta iz ruke je besplatna do kraja ove borbe. NL Iscrpi.

Expertise.NAME: Stručnost
Expertise.DESCRIPTION: Vuci karte sve NL dok ih u ruci ne budeš imao !M!.

Conserve Battery.NAME: Conserve Battery
Conserve Battery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Energy is conserved for next turn.

Nova.NAME: Nova
Nova.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each Power played this combat.

Reboot.NAME: Reboot
Reboot.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all of your cards into your draw pile, then draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Loop.NAME: Loop
Loop.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, use the passive ability of your next Orb.

Energy Pulse.NAME: Energy Pulse
Energy Pulse.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your Energy.
Energy Pulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to twice your Energy.

Heatsinks.NAME: Heatsinks
Heatsinks.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, draw !M! card.
Heatsinks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, draw !M! cards.

Blaster.NAME: Blaster
Blaster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [B] for each Channeled Orb. NL Exhaust.

Undo.NAME: Undo
Undo.DESCRIPTION: Set your HP to what it was last turn. NL Exhaust.

Force Field.NAME: Force Field
Force Field.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [B] for each Power card played this combat. NL Gain !B! Block.

Rip and Tear.NAME: Rip and Tear
Rip and Tear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

All For One.NAME: All For One
All For One.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put all Cost 0 cards from your discard pile into your hand.

Stack.NAME: Stack
Stack.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.
Stack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile +3.

Recycle.NAME: Recycle
Recycle.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain [B] equal to its cost.

Melter.NAME: Melter
Melter.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from an enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.

Sunder.NAME: Sunder
Sunder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills the enemy, gain [B] [B] [B].

Aggregate.NAME: Aggregate
Aggregate.DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] for every !M! cards in your draw pile.

Flux Capacitor.NAME: Flux Capacitor
Flux Capacitor.DESCRIPTION: Replace all Channeled Orbs with Plasma. NL Exhaust.

Streamline.NAME: Streamline
Streamline.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play Streamline, reduce its cost by !M! for this combat.

Axe Kick.NAME: Axe Kick
Axe Kick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke your next Orb.

Machine Learning.NAME: Machine Learning
Machine Learning.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! additional card at the start of each turn.
Machine Learning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! additional card at the start of each turn.

Prime.NAME: Prime
Prime.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Channel an Orb, draw !M! card.

Allocate.NAME: Allocate
Allocate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Lose 1 Strength. NL Lose 1 Dexterity.

Darkness.NAME: Darkness
Darkness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Channel !M! Dark.

White Noise.NAME: White Noise
White Noise.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Power to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Rainbow.NAME: Rainbow
Rainbow.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Lightning, 1 Frost, and 1 Dark. NL Exhaust.

Thunder Strike.NAME: Thunder Strike
Thunder Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Lightning Channeled this combat.

FTL.NAME: FTL
FTL.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have played less than !M! cards this turn, draw 1 card.

Multi-Cast.NAME: Multi-Cast
Multi-Cast.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb X times.
Multi-Cast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb X+1 times.

Doom and Gloom.NAME: Doom and Gloom
Doom and Gloom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel !M! Dark.

Reprogram.NAME: Reprogram
Reprogram.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them.

Echo Form.NAME: Echo Form
Echo Form.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn is played twice.
Echo Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn is played twice.

Static Discharge.NAME: Static Discharge
Static Discharge.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take attack damage, Channel !M! Lightning.

Rebound.NAME: Rebound
Rebound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

Magnetism.NAME: Magnetism
Magnetism.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a random colorless card to your hand.

Storm.NAME: Storm
Storm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power, Channel 1 Lightning.
Storm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Power, Channel 1 Lightning.

Gash.NAME: Gash
Gash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL All Gash cards deal !M! additional damage this combat.

Creative AI.NAME: Creative AI
Creative AI.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a random Power card to your hand.

Genetic Algorithm.NAME: Genetic Algorithm
Genetic Algorithm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. When played, permanently increase this card's Block by !M!. NL Exhaust.

Biased Cognition.NAME: Biased Cognition
Biased Cognition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL At the start of each turn, lose 1 Focus.

Hyperbeam.NAME: Hyperbeam
Hyperbeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose !M! Focus.

Barrage.NAME: Barrage
Barrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Channeled Orb.

Hello World.NAME: Hello World
Hello World.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.
Hello World.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.

Fission.NAME: Fission
Fission.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all of your Orbs. Gain an Orb slot for each Orb Evoked.

Chill.NAME: Chill
Chill.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Frost for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.
Chill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Channel !M! Frost per enemy. NL Exhaust.

Hologram.NAME: Hologram
Hologram.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a random card from your discard pile to your hand.
Hologram.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

Sweeping Beam.NAME: Sweeping Beam
Sweeping Beam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card.

Seek.NAME: Seek
Seek.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from your draw pile and place them into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Steam Power.NAME: Steam Power
Steam Power.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a Burn into your discard pile.

Impulse.NAME: Impulse
Impulse.DESCRIPTION: Use the passive effect of all of your Channeled Orbs. NL Exhaust.
Impulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Use the passive effect of all of your Channeled Orbs.

Go for the Eyes.NAME: Go for the Eyes
Go for the Eyes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.

Blizzard.NAME: Blizzard
Blizzard.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to twice the Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies.
Blizzard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal !M! times the Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies.

Redo.NAME: Redo
Redo.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb. NL Channel the Orb that was just Evoked.

Self Repair.NAME: Self Repair
Self Repair.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, heal !M! HP.

Auto Shields.NAME: Auto-Shields
Auto Shields.DESCRIPTION: If you have 0 Block, gain !B! Block.

Amplify.NAME: Amplify
Amplify.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Power is played twice.
Amplify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Powers are played twice.

Turbo.NAME: TURBO
Turbo.DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] [B]. NL Add a Void into your discard pile.
Turbo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] [B] [B]. NL Add a Void into your discard pile.

Buffer.NAME: Buffer
Buffer.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Buffer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next !M! times you would lose HP.

Scrape.NAME: Scrape
Scrape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard any non-cost 0 cards drawn this way.
